dublin_core.dcvalue: The purpose of this article is to describe the creation of a transdisciplinary group consisting of nurse educators a medical librarian lab technologists and a technology expert to lead the integration of electronic health technology including high fidelity simulation handheld technology and electronic health records within a school of nursing The use of innovative educational tools by nursing faculty can be daunting because of the steep learning curve The model described here is effective in developing faculty to use simulation and other technologies as teaching learning strategies
A transdisciplinary approach to faculty development in nursing education technology.
